name: ByteBack - Interview Prep Tool
description: ByteBack-Edu is an educational prep tool that aids tech candidates prepare for technical interviews through customized, skill specific quizes, and algorithm/debugging challenges in its integrated live code editor. Interviews bite, ByteBack!
skills: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, React, Axios, Express.js, MySQL, Chakra UI

name: Persephone's Garden
description: Sometimes we just need to touch grass. Grow your own ASCII based garden with Persephone's Garden! Plant, water, and grow your seeds to a full flower.

name: Forced Convection Cooling Module
description: The FCCM is a cost effective, and modular addition to the direct drive motors produced by Genesis Motion Solutions. Using the principles of forced convection and conduction, the module could replace the end-cover of any motor, providing superior heat dissipation leading to a potential performance increase of 2X the rated continuous torque. This cost effective solution weighed less than 1kg, cost less than $300 to produce, and added less than 50mm of length to the backside of the motor.
skills: SolidWorks CAD, SolidWorks Flow Analysis, Rapid Prototyping, Siemens NX

name: Precision Weighing Environment for Direct Metal Laser Sintering (DMLS)
description: This precision weighing environment was created to accurately weigh single layers of metallic powder (Ti-6AL-4V) used in Direct Metal Laser Sintering, or 3D metal printing, to determine the final density of the part. The key features of the design were the adjustable scraper with 6 angles of attack, with a height capable of being adjusted in 1um increments, and a vacuum sealed enclosure with an internal air circulation path and capability for nitrogen purging to reduce accidental combustion of aerosolized powder.
skills: SolidWorks CAD, SolidWorks Flow Analysis, Advance Manufacturing, Test Design

name: Sea to Sky
description: This logo was created to represent a fictional outdoor company centered around the roots of West Coast outdoor living.
